metdetection

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • metdetection.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    The Main class is used to interface with and run the MetricalLpcfgGenerator class.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 29 February, 2016

      • testGrammar

        private static void testGrammar(java.io.File testFile,
               java.util.List<java.io.File> anacrusisFiles,
               boolean useChannel,
               MetricalLpcfg grammar,
               MetricalLpcfgGenerator correctGrammarGenerator)
                         throws MetricalLpcfgElementNotFoundException
        Test the given Runner with the given generated grammar.
        Parameters:
        testFile - The MIDI File we will use to test the grammar.
        anacrusisFiles - The anacrusis files for this run.
        useChannel - True if to use channels as the gold standard voice in MIDI files. False for tracks.
        grammar - The grammar.
        correctGrammarGenerator - The correct grammar generator from this song.
        Throws:
        MetricalLpcfgElementNotFoundException - A tree to be extracted was not found in the grammar.

      • extractFromGrammar

        private static void extractFromGrammar(MetricalLpcfg grammar,
                      MetricalLpcfgGenerator toExtract)
                                throws MetricalLpcfgElementNotFoundException
        Extract the grammar rules from the given generator from the given grammar.
        Parameters:
        grammar - The grammar we want to extract the given rules from.
        toExtract - The generator which contains the rules we want to extract.
        Throws:
        MetricalLpcfgElementNotFoundException - A tree to be extracted was not found.

      • addToGrammar

        private static void addToGrammar(MetricalLpcfg grammar,
                MetricalLpcfgGenerator toAdd)
        Add the grammar rules from the given generator to the given grammar.
        Parameters:
        grammar - The grammar we want to add the given rules to.
        toAdd - The generator which contains the rules we want to add.

      • generateGrammar

        private static MetricalLpcfgGenerator generateGrammar(java.util.List<java.io.File> midiFiles,
                                     java.util.List<java.io.File> anacrusisFiles,
                                     boolean useChannel)
        Generate a grammar from the given files with the given Runner.
        Parameters:
        midiFiles - The Files we want to generate a grammar from.
        anacrusisFiles - The anacrusis files for the given midiFiles.
        useChannel - True if to use channels as the gold standard voice in MIDI files. False for tracks.

      • getAnacrusisLength

        private static int getAnacrusisLength(java.io.File testFile,
                     java.util.List<java.io.File> anacrusisFiles)
        Get the anacrusis length for the given test file given the anacrusis files.
        Parameters:
        testFile - The file for which we want the anacrusis.
        anacrusisFiles - The anacrusisFiles.
        Returns:
        The anacrusis length for the given test file.

      • getAllFilesRecursive

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getAllFilesRecursive(java.io.File file)
        Get and return a List of every file beneath the given one.
        Parameters:
        file - The head File.
        Returns:
        A List of every File under the given head.

      • argumentError

        private static void argumentError(java.lang.String message)
        An argument error occurred. Print the usage help info to standard error, and then exit.

        NOTE: This method calls System.exit(1) and WILL NOT return.

        Parameters:
        message - The error message to print at the beginning of the exception.
